Good day.\""},{"lineNumber":8131,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーは、中庭をさかさか掃除していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky was briskly cleaning the courtyard."},{"lineNumber":8132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、どうだあいつは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, how's that guy?\""},{"lineNumber":8133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……あいつ、というと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... that guy, you mean...\""},{"lineNumber":8134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":8135,"originalJapaneseLine":"中庭の反対側では、魔人レイが","translatedEnglishLine":"On the opposite side of the courtyard, the demon Rei"},{"lineNumber":8136,"originalJapaneseLine":"つまらなさそうに中庭を箒で掃いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was sweeping the courtyard with a broom looking bored."},{"lineNumber":8137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ララララ、ランス様が本気で下働きに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"La la la la, I never thought Lord Rance would seriously use demons for menial labor...!\""},{"lineNumber":8138,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人を使うとは思わなかっただすっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought he’d actually use demons like that...!\""},{"lineNumber":8139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫だ。あいつ、ブス専ロリコンだから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's alright. That guy's a lolicon who only likes ugly girls."},{"lineNumber":8140,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのガキがいる間はヘタなことはせん」","translatedEnglishLine":"He won't do anything foolish while that brat is around.\""},{"lineNumber":8141,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、ううっ、でも、絶対怒ってるだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, uh, but he's definitely angry...\""},{"lineNumber":8142,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなに暴れん坊だったのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though he used to be such a wild one...\""},{"lineNumber":8143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、気のせいだ気のせい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, it's just your imagination, just your imagination.\""},{"lineNumber":8144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううう、それでなくとも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuu, even without that,"},{"lineNumber":8145,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おっかないタイプだすのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he's already a scary type...\""},{"lineNumber":8146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後輩なんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He's a junior."},{"lineNumber":8147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しっかり面倒見てやれよーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You gotta take good care of him!\""},{"lineNumber":8148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああっ、ランス様〜〜〜っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah! Lord Rance~~~!\""},{"lineNumber":8149,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは笑いながら、どこかへ行ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance laughed and went off somewhere."},{"lineNumber":8150,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……こればっかりは参っただす……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haah... This really has me beaten...\""},{"lineNumber":8151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おら、魔人の指導なんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm no good at teaching demons...\""},{"lineNumber":8152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よォ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo.\""},{"lineNumber":8153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、ははははい！　なんだすか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, Hahaha! What is it!?\""},{"lineNumber":8154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一通り終わったぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everything's finished."},{"lineNumber":8155,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次はどーすんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you going to do next?\""},{"lineNumber":8156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええと、ではお食事の用意にしますだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, well then, I will prepare the meal.\""},{"lineNumber":8157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「料理ね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cooking, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":8158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと、おら一人でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, even though I'm alone...\""},{"lineNumber":8159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やるよ。メシを食いたきゃ働けとか抜かすガキが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll do it. That brat who says 'if you want to eat, you have to work' is annoying,"},{"lineNumber":8160,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うるさいんでな」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I'm gonna get going.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬ、ぬぬぬ！？　魔人の肩を持つのか！」
「それで？　お互いに謝れってか。馬鹿臭ェ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So? You want us to apologize to each other? Ridiculous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや。レイ、勝負しろ。
二人で勝負して、負けた方が謝れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of you compete, and whoever loses apologizes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なッ……し、しかしそれは……」
「……殺さないようにするのが厄介だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's tricky making sure we don't kill each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやまあもう、いいか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I guess it's fine now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あからさまに慌てる武士に、
レイは気負うでもなく、半身になって拳を握る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei, without any pressure, turned half his body and clenched his fist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、誰が殴り合いなんて言った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, who said anything about fighting with fists?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メンコだ！」
「いいだろ？」
「い、いや、メンコ……？
そ、そんな事で…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-would you really do it over something like that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やり方知らん」
「教えてやるって。まずこうやってだな……」
メアリーによる、メンコのレクチャーが始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary began a lesson on how to play Menko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………おい、ビリビリ野郎。
いいのか、それで」
「ああ………………どうやら、いいらしい」
「……ふん。騒がせやがって……」
やがて、ぺちーんぺちーんと
メンコを打つ音が聞こえ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: began to be heard as Menko cards were slapped down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっ、ささっ……」
「ん？　なんだ、ロッキーか」
「あっ、ランス様。こんにちわですだ」
ロッキーは、中庭をさかさか掃除していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky was briskly cleaning the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よう、どうだあいつは」
「あ……あいつ、というと……」
中庭の反対側では、魔人レイが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the opposite side of the courtyard, the demon Rei

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまらなさそうに中庭を箒で掃いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was sweeping the courtyard with a broom looking bored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ララララ、ランス様が本気で下働きに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "La la la la, I never thought Lord Rance would seriously use demons for menial labor...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を使うとは思わなかっただすっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought he’d actually use demons like that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫だ。あいつ、ブス専ロリコンだから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's alright. That guy's a lolicon who only likes ugly girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのガキがいる間はヘタなことはせん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He won't do anything foolish while that brat is around."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、ううっ、でも、絶対怒ってるだ……
あんなに暴れん坊だったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though he used to be such a wild one..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、気のせいだ気のせい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, it's just your imagination, just your imagination."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううう、それでなくとも
おっかないタイプだすのに……」
「後輩なんだ。
しっかり面倒見てやれよーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You gotta take good care of him!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああっ、ランス様〜〜〜っ……！」
ランスは笑いながら、どこかへ行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance laughed and went off somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……こればっかりは参っただす……
おら、魔人の指導なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm no good at teaching demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よォ」
「はっ、ははははい！　なんだすか！？」
「一通り終わったぜ。
次はどーすんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you going to do next?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、ええと、ではお食事の用意にしますだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, well then, I will prepare the meal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「料理ね……」
「ええと、おら一人でも……」
「やるよ。メシを食いたきゃ働けとか抜かすガキが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll do it. That brat who says 'if you want to eat, you have to work' is annoying,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うるさいんでな」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

しっかり面倒見てやれよーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You gotta take good care of him!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああっ、ランス様〜〜〜っ……！」
ランスは笑いながら、どこかへ行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance laughed and went off somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……こればっかりは参っただす……
おら、魔人の指導なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm no good at teaching demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よォ」
「はっ、ははははい！　なんだすか！？」
「一通り終わったぜ。
次はどーすんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you going to do next?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、ええと、ではお食事の用意にしますだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, well then, I will prepare the meal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「料理ね……」
「ええと、おら一人でも……」
「やるよ。メシを食いたきゃ働けとか抜かすガキが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll do it. That brat who says 'if you want to eat, you have to work' is annoying,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うるさいんでな」
